name: Construction projects
text:
In the solicitation for bids for construction projects with a total estimated contract value of $1,000,000 or higher, the university shall require each bidder to submit a listing of the bidder's subcontractors who are to perform work with a value that exceeds five per cent of the total bid amount submitted by the bidder. [L 2010, c 82, pt of §1]
 
Note
 
  Report to legislature on internal procurement processes, etc. (through 2012).  L 2010, c 82, §4.
